title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast - Nov 16 2020
itunes:title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast - Nov 16 2020
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1:                                         


Mark Steyn guest hosts for Rush on Monday. We’re supposed to believe Dems won the presidency but lost every competitive House seat? No indictments from Durham report. BLM/Antifa attack Trump supporters and local businesses in D.C. Deep State undermined Trump’s order to withdraw troops from Syria. It’s not about Trump, it’s about you. Big Tech bans anything outside the official narrative. Punctuation is triggering. The left burns books, not the right. Drive-By’s attack Trump’s legal team. Erykah Badu tests positive for COVID in one nostril but negative in the other. Biden’s cancer initiative gave no money in grants for cancer research.                          


PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2:                                         


Mark Steyn interviews attorney Sidney Powell about Trump’s post-election legal battles. The equal protections aspects of Bush v. Gore being used today. Boris Johnson considers keeping British lockdown going until next Spring. Venezuelan fraud machines. Class action lawsuits against the states that certify. Foreign countries counting American votes. Will Chief Justice Roberts refuse the case? There’s no silver lining in having the highest office stolen.                                      


PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:


Get the Supreme Court ruling done. You couldn’t get away with this fraud in Norway, Denmark or Sweden. There’s no letup in Democrats stealing elections. Where can conservatives go to voice their opinions? Don’t get mad, get even. The benefits of being in the Million MAGA March. The left looks to snuff out dissent. Lockdowns don’t work. U.K. has had 25-percent increase in at-home deaths. The death of normal life. Philadelphia bans public and private indoor gatherings of any size.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
